item.title: Searchers of the Unknown Omnibus v4
item.description: Searchers of the Unknown Omnibus v4 (PDF) Searchers of the Unknown Omnibus v4 (ODT) This is a minor update to my Searchers of the Unknown Omnibus. Changes include: Removed Encounter Movement Penalty for shields Nerfed bonuses for Races and Classes as I think they were excessive Added bonus for stealth and stunts for theives Various minor fixes and tweaks Version 3 of the Omnibus can still be found here

item.title: They Came From the Sky
item.description:
Note: I originaly wrote this story 4 years ago for /r/writingprompts “Space Art Wallpapers 20”by en busca del bit perdido is licensed under CC BY-NC-SA 2.0
They came from the sky in a rain of fire and on that day the gods wept for they knew that we were doomed. You are asking me to describe them so do not blame me for the dread it will instill within you.
